org.kohsuke.stapler.compression

Class CompressionServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • org.kohsuke.stapler.compression.CompressionServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    public class CompressionServletResponse
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
    HttpServletResponse that recognizes Content-Encoding: gzip in the response header and acts accordingly.
    Author:
    Kohsuke Kawaguchi

      void setContentLength(int len)
      If we've already inserted gzip compression filter, then we can't let the content length set from the app because that refers to the size of the uncompressed content, where we actually need the size of the compressed content.

      • setContentLength

        public void setContentLength(int len)
        If we've already inserted gzip compression filter, then we can't let the content length set from the app because that refers to the size of the uncompressed content, where we actually need the size of the compressed content. For the same reason, if the content length is set before we can decide whether to
